page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: About a year ago (1984)there was a road running through Main street in Bulwell. But now there is a road running all around the outside of Bulwell market and the shops. But now the pavement has been made wider and there are benches in the middle of the pavement.The pavement might have been made wider to help the elderly people for shopping in the market. More shops have been opened up because of the number of people down there.Car parks have been made for the drivers who come down the road to go to the market and have nowhere to park.
